title: Rotation test mission
body: Validate that Vault dynamic Couchbase credentials rotate without service impact.

title: Agentic trust bootstrap
body: End to end test of Vault AppRole, Transit encryption, dynamic Couchbase users and Ollama based QnA.

title: Failover and grace window
body: Simulate Couchbase or Vault hiccups and verify that the grace window keeps the health endpoint green while the backend recovers.
